modalLogic.formula.factory

Class FormulaFactory<P>

  • java.lang.Object
    • modalLogic.formula.factory.FormulaFactory<P>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.commons.collections15.Factory<Formula<P>>

    public class FormulaFactory<P>
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.apache.commons.collections15.Factory<Formula<P>>
    Class FormulaFactory allows to build up a formula in a state-machine like way similar to OpenGL.
